mapper.select: SELECT M.NO , M.EMAIL , M.PASSWORD , M.NICK , TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE , M.INTRODUCTION , TO_CHAR(M.DEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DEL_DATE , M.ADMIN_YN , NVL(P.WARNING_POINT, 0) AS WARNING_POINT FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT) AS WARNING_POINT FROM ( SELECT W.MEMBER_NO , L.POINT FROM WARNING W JOIN WARNING_LIST L ON L.NO = W.WARNING_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = W.MEMBER_NO ) GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ) P ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO ORDER BY NO

SELECT M.NO , M.EMAIL , M.PASSWORD , M.NICK , TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE , M.INTRODUCTION , TO_CHAR(M.DEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DEL_DATE , M.ADMIN_YN , NVL(P.WARNING_POINT, 0) AS WARNING_POINT FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT) AS WARNING_POINT FROM ( SELECT W.MEMBER_NO , L.POINT FROM WARNING W JOIN WARNING_LIST L ON L.NO = W.WARNING_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = W.MEMBER_NO ) GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ) P ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE M.EMAIL LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR M.EMAIL LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY EMAIL
ORDER BY NICK
